keyword: how many calories are in taco bell chicken quesadilla
title: How Many Calories in Taco Bell Chicken Quesadilla?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in Taco Bell chicken quesadilla, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, sodium, and menu tweaks for better choices.
h1: How Many Calories in Taco Bell Chicken Quesadilla?
assumptions: Standard Taco Bell menu item: flour tortilla, grilled chicken, three-cheese blend, creamy jalapeño sauce; no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and customizations. Values based on Taco Bell's official data; check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: A Taco Bell Chicken Quesadilla contains about 510 calories with 29g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with menu info.

tweaks.label: Fresco style (no sauce or cheese, add pico de gallo)

faqs.q: How many calories are in a Taco Bell chicken quesadilla?
What's the protein in Taco Bell chicken quesadilla?
faqs.a: About 29 grams of protein from the grilled chicken and cheese.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in Taco Bell chicken quesadilla?
faqs.a: Around 1220 mg, mostly from the sauce and cheese.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in Taco Bell chicken quesadilla?
faqs.a: Yes, 43 grams total, including 3 grams of fiber from the tortilla.

faqs.q: How to make Taco Bell chicken quesadilla lower calorie?
faqs.a: Opt for fresco style or skip the creamy jalapeño sauce to reduce by 100+ calories.
